name: Toast Ghost
description:
Too spooky for BOO!

Toast ghost is a short but sweet, pastel visual novel created for "Wholesome Games Jam 2020!".

The story's about Boo the little ghostie and how their first haunt didn't go quite as they planned to. However during his time he learns something special, and makes a new friend along the way!
